duties_responsibilities.duty: Formulate the Technology Product Development (TPD) strategy aligning it with organization strategy.
Lead the development of key technology strategies and provide critical recommendations for decision-making.
Drive new product innovation strategy combining market research, product maturity, obtainable market analysis, and 'Verizon Fit'.
Mentor the Strategy team, fostering a culture of innovation and collaboration.
Support technology-centric corporate partnerships and drive strategic thinking and collaboration.
Define strategies supporting new product innovation initiatives and capitalize on key emerging technologies.
Collaborate with GN&T organizations to develop broader GN&T strategy and define opportunities to leverage technology investments.
Lead and develop teams of indirect reports, demonstrating strong leadership and communication skills.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Business, Management, or related field preferred
